Items.Title: Communication from the Mayor - Submitting the name of Phillips Aarons to the Council for its advice and consent regarding his appointment as a lay member of the Art Commission.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this Mayor's Message be Approved by Committee approved by Roll Call.
